Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, St. Lawrence, 51st, Cottage Grove and 47th: due to, street blockage near 47th/St. Lawrence.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Pink Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Pink Line trains are standing at Western due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Pink Line trains are standing at Western due to police activity.

Bus shuttle service has been requested to provide connecting service from 54th/Cermak to Polk.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Northbound Reroute near Jeffery/83rd
ShortDescription: NB J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 85th, South Chicago, & Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/83rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 85th, South Chicago, & Jeffery, due to street blockage near Jeffery/83rd.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
